Description: 2 bed 1 bath condo offers great amenities like granite & stainless steel kitchen and marble tile bath & jacuzzi tub. Features high ceilings and hardwood floors, in unit laundry, back deck & front porch, off street parking, nest devices, and sprinkler system. Abuts both the historic Perkins school (with 3 playgrounds open to the public) and newly redeveloped Irving Park. Walking distance to public transportation, Charles River Reservation and Park, and Watertown Square shops (and upscale restaurants like Branch Line, Bar'Cino, Buttermilk & Bourbon, and Toro Jiro).
